title: Doran's Shield needs a Buff
body:
I think {{item:1054}} could need a buff for Meele vs Ranged matchups on Top Lane.

Current Stats:

>+80 health

>**Passive**
+6 flat health regen per 5 seconds
UNIQUE: Blocks 8 damage from basic attacks and single target abilities from champions.

I would suggest to make it _Meele only_, so it won't be abused in Bot Lane matchups, and change it like this:

>+80 health

>**Passive**
+6 flat health regen per 5 seconds
UNIQUE: Blocks 6 damage from basic attacks ~~and single target abilities~~ from champions, doubled to 12 against Ranged Champions.

This would actually make the Item viable again in specific matchups.

replies.body:
I like the change but I still think it needs a gold price reduction. 

Give it the increased hp regeneration from pots that dark seal gets.

Now you have a viable item to help you survive lane and can start 2 pots.
